Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: Spherical jar with a straight neck and a flat base with a depression. There is some decoration on the shoulder and a potter's mark. The decorative pattern is incised: a horizontal band delimited by two lines with a zigzag inside.  The clay is covered with a dark red and pale orange layer and has two yellowish patches on the shoulder.
